pytket.logging¶

Module to control visibility of internal logging from tket.

class pytket.logging.level¶

Members:

trace : all logs

debug : debug logs and above

info : informational logs and above

warn : warnings and above

err : error and critical logs only (default)

critical : critical logs only

off : no logs

property name¶

(self: handle) -> str

pytket.logging.set_level(arg0: pytket.logging.level) → None¶

Set the global logging level.

Parameters

level – Desired logging level
